name: Melokutom The Bad Little Pink
description:
STORY

 After years as a television celebrity, our beloved doll has been abandoned. But of course, such a fun toy wouldn't want to feel alone, so like every gift that is more than cool, the laughing toy will have a lot of fun, but now with you.

 A fun little pink toy that will make your day more than fun with lots of tickling and hugs around your house.

PORTUGUÊS

Após anos como celebridade nas televisões, nosso bonequinho amado foi abandonado.

Mas é claro que um brinquedo tão divertido não ia querer se sentir só, então como todo presente mais do que legal, o brinquedo risonho irá se divertir muito, mas agora com você.

CONTROLS

WASD - Move

E - interect with objects

HTML5

- The web version is a very short format, a DEMO of the project.

- To play the whole game download the full version.

       NOTES

- If you have a problem with the Setup.exe file, download the .zip file.

     
Feel free to leave a comment and rate after you’ve played the game.
